mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(b.parentNO,0)=0 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS level, b.articleNO, b.parentNO, b.title, b.content, b.writeDate, b.imageFileName, b.id, b.cat, b.sub FROM t_board b WHERE 1=1 AND b.cat = #{cat} AND b.sub = #{sub} ORDER BY IFNULL(NULLIF(b.parentNO,0), b.articleNO) DESC, CASE WHEN IFNULL(b.parentNO,0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, b.articleNO ASC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id, parentNO, writeDate, cat, sub FROM t_board WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, content, imageFileName, id, parentNO, writeDate, cat, sub) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id}, IFNULL(#{parentNO},0), NOW(), #{cat}, #{sub})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} OR parentNO = #{articleNO}
